metadata.synopsis: Player reacts to being pushed by the rings in the crypt of the Shar temple.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. loadLevel SCL_Main_A2. goto -717 5 -8623. Run into one of the triggers.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: That glowing ring seems promising. Better than getting laid out on my back again.
1.context: NodeContext: Just been repulsed by an invisible kinetic force that threw them a few feet backwards.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: The Dark Lady's path lies in darkness. Perhaps that is how I can proceed.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Almost made it that time - just have to watch my step.
2.context: NodeContext: Just been repulsed by an invisible kinetic force that threw them a few feet backwards.

3.speaker: Player
3.context: NodeContext: Just been repulsed by an invisible kinetic force that threw them a few feet backwards.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I need to be more careful. There must be a way around the ring...
4.context: NodeContext: Just been repulsed by an invisible kinetic force that threw them a few feet backwards.
